body.name: Vanicream Daily Facial Moisturizer With Ceramides and Hyaluronic Acid - Formulated Without Common Irritants for Those with Sensitive Skin, 3 fl oz (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 7 mins
features: Vanicream is the #1 Dermatologist recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin: Source IQVIA ProVoice Survey, 12 months ending July 2024
Sensitive moisturizer: Vanicream fragrance-free daily face moisturizer is a lightweight, gluten-free moisturizer for sensitive skin
Mild formula: This unscented, hydrating moisturizer is formulated with 5 key ceramides, hyaluronic acid, squalane and glycerin; non-comedogenic won’t clog pores
No common chemical irritants: Our products are free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde releasers
Dermatologist tested: Dermatologists consider our ingredients to be desirable and not irritating or sensitizing to the skin
Directions: Apply as needed to face day or night; packaging may vary
body.description: Vanicream Daily Facial moisturizer is a rich, but lightweight lotion that provides effective moisturization for day or night. It is formulated with hyaluronic acid and ceramides to help to hydrate and retain the skin's moisture.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #100 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #6 in Face Moisturizers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This face moisturizer is the BEST!! I use Vanicream brand for all my skincare products that I can. It is so light, never greasy, and makes my skin so soft. I never gotten a break out from this lotion. I pair it with the vanicream face moisturizer and love the results. It has no scent, and I can mix it with a face tanner and get great results. NO other brand compares for me. I used to break out from other face moisturizers and this one has been a life saver!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this as apart of both my day and night skincare routine. It's very light and simple. Doesn't clog my pores or cause breakouts, which is a godsend for me. Little to no scent, absorbs fast, and is great for under makeup or spf. My favorite moisturizer I've tried and it's very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A dermatologist recommended this face cream to me and I love it. I have many allergies and my skin is very sensitive and this cream does not bother my skin at all. I apply the cream before I put on my makeup. Skin stays moisturized all day. My husband hates face cream but he likes this one because it is light and does not feel sticky or oily on the face. Great Value. I used to buy very expensive face cream from Blue Lagoon and this is just as nice for 1/4 of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My preferred moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this facial moisturizer for about a year now and I prefer it over others that I have tried. I have subclinical acne and sensitive skin, and this moisturizer leaves my skin feeling hydrated but not sticky, not flaky, and does not cause irritation or breakouts.I use a tinted moisturizer for my full face makeup, and it pairs well with this moisturizer, it's never been a problem for me.The reason I cannot give five stars is because if I am not using this every day, by the time I get to the end of the tube, the formula seems to separate and does not adhere to my skin as easily. I assume this is because it has been exposed to air and the formula expires. Maybe this is my own fault? I can't be too sure. One tube lasts me about three months for face, neck, and chest.I've tried a lot of other moisturizers: La Roche Posay, Cetaphil, Cerave, etc. and I continue to chose this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizing SPF alternative to Elta MD.
reviews.reviewText: I used Elta MD for several years but eventually reached the point where I could no longer justify the price. This is a fantastic alternative. The consistency isn't as "liquidy" or whatever -- this stuff is certainly much thicker -- but my advice is to blend it in your hands first before applying to your face. And apply it very gently. This helps smooth it over the skin and avoid pilling. And yes, this sometimes pills but what SPF doesn't? Stop buying expensive stuff and please, for the love of God and this planet, stop experimenting with moisturizers and SPFs and skincare products in general and then throwing them out. This stuff will make your life a lot easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Rare to find an affordable face cream where you instantly feel the effects as soon as you put it on. This cream is unscented and lightweight. A little goes a long way and it quickly and seamlessly seeps into the skin leaving it nice and soft. Great for morning prep, pre makeup and evening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lotion for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lotion for my face. My skin gets really dry in the winter and this lotion has remedied that. The only other moisturizer that worked similarly well was argan oil and I could not use that as a day cream (too shiny). This cream absorbs pretty well and does not leave a sheen. It has good ingredients, no unnecessary and harmful chemicals from what I could tell (like artificial colors, or preservatives that are carcinogens). The price was reasonable. It's unscented, which works well for me (one less chemical). Will be buying this cream again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very greasy feeling
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a good facial sunscreen for a while. This is unfortunately another one for my bin of sunscreen flops. Note that I have very oily, sensitive, acne-prone skin. This product was used for typical daily wear (for me, taking several 10-minute walks in the hot summer sun throughout the day). I don't sweat much, but I am typically quite oily even without moisturizing products.Pros:- Very moisturizing. It would be good for someone with very dry skin. My skin looked exceptionally well hydrated.- Unscented. My skin tends to react poorly to scented products. This had no scent.- Does protect against the sun. With proper application, I have never burned with this product.Cons:- VERY greasy. I applied just enough sunscreen to cover my skin. It felt like I was covered in an oily film. My whole face had a slick sheen to it. It was especially greasy looking in the summer sun.- Does leave a slight white cast. I would say my skin tone is lightly tanned. There was a light but noticeable white film over my whole face, even after rubbing in and drying down for 15 minutes. Would be best for those with fairer skin tones.- Thick formulation. It was difficult to apply in a uniform layer because of how thick the product was. I prefer a more liquidy formulation for even, light coverage. It felt very oily/film-like on my skin even after drying down.

My sister in law recommended this face moisturizer to me a year ago when I was visiting her in the US. I had been struggling to find a good face moisturizer. I have sensitive skin - oily and dry combo. I was looking for a moisturizer that was fragrance free, lightweight (doesn’t feel like you have a leftover film on your skin) and made of clean ingredients. This moisturizer is absolutely amazing and meets all those criteria. It also has hyaluronic acid in it which was a bonus. My skin eats this up, no reactions, and leaves my face feeling moisturized and fresh. I absolutely love it. I was so happy to see that it is sold on Amazon Canada (I’m Canadian). Sure it’s a little on the pricy side $28 plus tax for 89mL/3 oz but it is worth it by far for me. And you really don’t need a lot when applying. Honestly when you find something that works, it’s worth the money!

reviews.reviewTitle: No funciono para mi piel mixta
reviews.reviewText: A pesar de ser ligera, me deja una sensación grasosa/pegajosa que incomoda (como las cremas con urea). Además, me produce un poco de ardor en piel y ojos al colocármela. No es lo que esperaba.
Love this moisturiser. My face is not greasy all day. It is clean and does not clog my pores
So thick and white good moisturising sunscreen for winter months and cold countries, not suitable for daily wear in our tropical country

I bought this as a substitute for CeraVe’s moisturizing cream because it contains similar ingredients but this one has even more ceramides. It tingles like CeraVe but has a lighter consistency. It’s not thick and dries fast and keeps skin hydrated for quite a while. Very good cream to mix with other active ingredients.
